statements: SELECT * FROM team_tasks ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, deadline FROM team_tasks WHERE assigned_to = 'Alice';
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM team_tasks WHERE deadline >= '2023-01-15';
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM team_tasks WHERE deadline < '2023-02-01' ORDER BY task_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM team_tasks WHERE task_name LIKE '%Database%';
SELECT * FROM team_tasks WHERE assigned_to = 'Alice' ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM team_tasks WHERE deadline >= '2022-01-01' AND deadline <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY deadline;
SELECT task_id, task_name, assigned_to, deadline FROM team_tasks WHERE task_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND assigned_to LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY task_id;
SELECT * FROM team_tasks WHERE deadline >= '2022-01-01' AND deadline <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY assigned_to, deadline;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM team_tasks WHERE assigned_to = 'Bob' OR assigned_to = 'Charlie';
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM tasks WHERE assignee_id = 1 ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT task_name, assignee_id FROM tasks WHERE deadline >= '2022-10-31' ORDER BY task_name;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND assignee_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT team_members.member_name, tasks.task_name FROM team_members JOIN tasks ON team_members.member_id = tasks.assignee_id WHERE team_id = 2 ORDER BY team_members.member_name, tasks.task_name;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM tasks WHERE assignee_id = 1 ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT task_name, assignee_id, deadline FROM tasks WHERE task_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY assignee_id ASC, deadline DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, team_members.member_name, team_members.role FROM tasks JOIN team_members ON tasks.assignee_id = team_members.member_id WHERE team_members.role = 'Developer';
SELECT task_name, assignee_id, deadline FROM tasks WHERE deadline >= '2022-01-01' AND deadline <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY deadline ASC;
SELECT task_name, assignee_id, deadline FROM tasks WHERE assignee_id = 2 OR assignee_id = 3 ORDER BY assignee_id ASC, deadline ASC;
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers;
SELECT team_id, team_name FROM Teams WHERE team_lead = 101;
SELECT task_name, deadline, status FROM Tasks WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT member_name, team_name FROM TeamMembers JOIN Teams ON TeamMembers.team_id = Teams.team_id;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, deadline FROM Tasks ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM Teams ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, status FROM Tasks WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT member_name, team_name FROM TeamMembers JOIN Teams ON TeamMembers.team_id = Teams.team_id WHERE team_lead = 101;
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers ORDER BY member_name ASC, team_id DESC;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(member_id) AS total_members FROM Teams JOIN TeamMembers ON Teams.team_id = TeamMembers.team_id GROUP BY team_name HAVING total_members > 3;
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM tasks WHERE deadline > '2021-09-01';
SELECT task_name, assigned_to FROM tasks ORDER BY assigned_to ASC;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM teams WHERE team_lead = 'Alice';
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM tasks WHERE task_id IN (SELECT task_id FROM assignments);
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE deadline > '2023-01-01';
SELECT task_name, assigned_to FROM tasks WHERE assigned_to = 'John Doe';
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM teams ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT assignment_id, task_name, assigned_to FROM assignments JOIN tasks ON tasks.task_id = assignments.task_id WHERE completion_date IS NULL;
SELECT task_name, deadline_date FROM tasks JOIN deadlines ON tasks.task_id = deadlines.task_id WHERE reminder_sent = TRUE AND deadline_date < '2023-06-30';
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT member_id, member_name FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Developer';
SELECT team_name, department FROM teams WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT member_name, team_name FROM team_members JOIN teams ON team_members.team_id = teams.team_id;
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, department FROM teams WHERE team_id = 2;
SELECT member_name, role FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Developer';
SELECT task_name, description, deadline FROM tasks WHERE team_id = 3 ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT t.team_name, t.department, m.member_name, m.role FROM teams t JOIN team_members m ON t.team_id = m.team_id;
